participant_1.background:
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
I build things with my hands and enjoy working with my dad.
my father lives in china.
i do not have any children.
i like to go to bars and people watch.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.
I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon.
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to take daily walks and grow my own vegetables.
I like to build things with my hands and I also enjoy people watching.
That sounds really fun! I wish I was more creative.
I'm not very creative either, but it's still fun to try new things.
I know what you mean. I like to do things that remind me of my childhood.
That's a great way to stay connected to your roots.
Yeah, it really is. I love going to the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.
That sounds really nice. I love diners!
Me too! They're so cozy and homey.
I'm glad you have something that reminds you of your childhood.
